description: Delivery chaos comes days before Christmas and follows fears about a new strain of the coronavirus in the UK.
title: DHL and Royal Mail warn on parcel disruption
title_page: DHL and Royal Mail warn on parcel disruption - BBC News
maintext: "This is a fast-moving situation and we are monitoring things on an hourly basis," it said. Parcels it already has will be "held securely" until it can transport them it said.
